transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Haanji sir, main maine kal iske liye call kiya tha aapko, yeh jo white marble temple hai na, iski buyleads hi consume karni thi sir aapko. To aap apna abhi aap system pe available ho ya phone pe ho?
Customer: Phone pe hai.
Executive: Achha, system aap open kar sakte ho sir agar possible hai to? Haan lo, nahi hold pe nahi.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam boliye. Ji main ye keh rahi hu sir laptop aap open kar sakte ho?
Customer: Ah main laptop to nahi hai, mobile se nahi kar sakta hu main. 
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai to aap ek kaam karo, latest buylead pe ek bari click karo.
Customer: Ek minute chalu hai.
Customer: [inaudible] birthday ka to niche abhi aayega.
Customer: Ek minute. Hmm.
Customer: Latest buylead pe mujhe click karna hai, theek hai? Haan ji.
Executive: Ab waha pe aap click karoge, haan.
Customer: Recent pe jaana hai na, recent?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, ab relevant relevant aur recent ke just right hand side pe aap dekhna ek past lead ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Recent mein ye hai ki abhi one hour pehle cement [unintelligible].
Executive: Nahi nahi main main aapko bata rahi hu, aap buyleads jo aata hai na most relevant, most recent uske bagal mein aap dekhna past lead likha hua aa raha hoga.
Customer: Hmm hmm kar raha hu ek minute, isko update update nahi tha na update kar raha hu isko main. 
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Recent mein aa gaya kya, theek hai? Nahi relevant aur recent ke bagal mein past lead aa raha hoga sir.
Customer: Dekho relevant, recent aur catalog view aur related, ye hai char char option hai isme. Ek to relevant aa gaya. Haan buylead haan.
Executive: Ek ye aa gaya recent aa gaya abhi ka just. Aur uske bagal mein dekho do option aata hai most relevant, most recent. Haan. Past lead bhi aa raha hoga.
Executive: Isme related tender ho gaya usse related ho gaya past aa gaya haan ye raha past.
Executive: Past lead mein click karo aap. Kar liya. Waha aap dekho wo buylead aayi hongi white marble temple ki ek ghante pehle, paanch ghante, teen ghante pehle. Lead dikh rahi hai aapko sold out ho gayi hai jo?
Customer: Marble inlay flooring quantity 180 square feet ki aa rahi hai usme to. Temple ki bhi hogi upar aap search karo dekho white marble temple ki bhi buylead hogi sir.
Executive: Ek minute. Hmm.
Customer: Past mein to yahi bata raha hai marble marble inlay flooring hai. Inlay flooring hai. Italian inlay flooring services hai temple construction hai uske niche dekhna marble temple hai uske niche red stone hai. Marble temple construction hai haan haan I am interested. Marble temple ki bhi aa rahi hai white marble temple aap niche dekhna. Red sandstone temple aa gaya sold out sold out dikha hai sab mein. Haan to us pe aapko I am interested karna hai aap niche dekhna marble temple ki bhi dikhenge sir aapko.
Executive: Theek hai. Main is pe kar raha hu jo hamare. Haan haan bilkul dikh rahi hai. Main bata rahi hu agar ye cheeze aap search karke karte na aur search category aata un upar option, waha pe white marble temple aap search karoge to aapko kewal white marble temple ki hi lead dikhenge.
Executive: Hum to dekho madam jo hamare jo ye main is pe sab pe I am interested kar raha hu is pe. Dekho aap na aap main aapko batati hu aap ek bari system se agar online aa sakte the. Main abhi laptop lekar ke abhi hai na thodi der mein main ya to phir main. Dekho aap ek kaam karna main aapko guide kar deti hu jab bhi aap laptop pe free rehna aap past lead pe jaana past lead mein na aap yaha pe search buylead ka option aata hai. Aap dekhiye jab past lead pe aap click karte ho to waha search buylead ka option dikhega, waha pe by product aap search kar sakte ho. To jab aap search karoge na white marble temple to aapko kewal usi ki buylead dikhenge jo sold out hui hai white marble temple ki. Mobile se kar lenge mam ye to koi dikkat nahi hai. Nahi mobile mein aap bata rahe ho na ki aapko white marble temple ki nahi dikh rahi hai flooring services ki dikh rahi hai construction marble ki dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Wo koi nahi ab to ah sara jo hai na hamare paas hai nahi. Nahi nahi main kar dunga mam aapko main samajh gaya. Theek hai koi bhi buylead agar aapko dikhti hai white marble temple ki to usko I am interested mark kar dena aap, theek hai? Nahi main ab kar diya madam main sara cheeze. Haan but aisa buylead ho ki wo white marble temple ka hona chahiye kyuki aur main do minute aati hai jaise matlab active rehta hai aur gayab ho jati hai wo ye ye kaise uske liye na wo refresh karna hai sir wo system nahi buylead aa rahi hai har do minute char minute mein aati hai aap dekho kya hota hai. Sir aapke paas bhi aa rahi hai. Main batau agar aapke paas buylead nahi aa rahi hoti na to aapke application mein wo buylead aapko sold out mein bhi nahi dikhti. Agar buylead paanch log purchase wo ek second do second mein gayab ho jati hai. Sir wo paanch log agar consume kar lenge to wo to ek second do second mein bhi gayab ho jayegi iske liye aapko buylead pe hamare paas nahi hai. Sir buylead ke tab pe aap refresh karoge na har do se char minute mein to buylead aapki sold out hone se pehle aap easily purchase kar paoge. Aapko buylead ke tab pe refresh karna padega agar aap phone se app use kar rahe ho to. kya fayda hoga. 5 lakh ka package ka kya fayda hamara? Nahi aisa nahi hai sir sabse zyada buylead event jo aapke other competitor hai unke comparison mein sabse zyada lead aap hi purchase kar rahe ho abhi aaj ke time mein. Kitni buylead hamare paas approve ho rahi hai kitni usme se aap purchase kar rahe ho agar main iska comparison karu to aap balki sabse zyada lead purchase kar rahe ho. Aapka abhi buylead ka consumption low hai to white marble temple mein hai bas. Temple aata to nahi hai ek bhi buylead sold nahi hai. Sir aayi hai sari buylead aayi hai lekin wo sold out ho rahi hai. Iska trick to aapko Priyanshu ne bataya tha na kya karna hai. Kitna kitna second gayab? Second se matlab nahi hota hai sir. Aisa thodi na hota hai ki har second mein IndiaMART mein buylead aati hogi. Problem kya hota hai main batati hu. Wo wo kyu bolta hai to kisi kisi bhi lag rahi hai ye. Aapko buylead ke tab pe refresh karna hota hai sir. Aap na jitna buylead ke tab pe refresh karoge utna easily aap lead purchase kar paoge. Ye cheez main aapko samjhana chah rahi hu. Ye matter nahi karta wo kitne seconds mein lead sold out ho rahi hai aap kitna IndiaMART pe actively buylead pe click kar rahe ho buylead ke tab ko refresh kar rahe ho wo matter karta hai sir. Ab dekho 2000 supplier hai 1000 supplier hai paanch log buylead consume kar sakte hai to wo 1000 mein se to koi bhi supplier ho sakta hai sir buylead to sabke paas jaati hai. 5 lakh ka package hai to. To sir aap buylead purchase to kar rahe ho aap dekho mahine ki 300 400 buylead bhi aa rahi hai to usme se aap achha khasa lead purchase kar rahe ho. To hamare paas nahi aa rahi na. Paanch to nahi ho rahi na purchase. Sir aayi hai to aapne purchase kaise kiya buylead to aap kar hi rahe ho purchase daily kar rahe ho aap to. Abhi nahi ho rahi hai purchase hamare se. Aap ek bari jis tarike se maine aapko bataya hai na ki aap refresh kar main kar dunga mam isme thoda bahut kaam baki hai main kar dunga isko. Haan baki aap dekho abhi aa rahi hai buylead bas aap usko I am interested karte jao. Abhi dekho marble inlay aapne kal bhi kiya marble temple construction service ka. Shortlist madam shortlist bhi kar dunga isko I am interested. Haan ek bar aap kar lo phir hum connect karte hai. me dalna hai wo bhi kar dunga main agar isme agar man lo kam nahi hua hua hai isme keywords mein wagera mein wo bhi kam kar dunga sab cheez ka kam kar dunga main. Haan phir ek bari hum connect kar lenge dobara theek hai sir pehle aap is pe thoda sa ek bar isko work on kar lijiye. Theek hai. Theek hai mam okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to find white marble temple buyleads.

- Buyleads disappear quickly.

- Believes not receiving enough buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to search for specific buyleads.

- Executive explained how to refresh buylead tab.

- Executive clarified buylead consumption depends on competition.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will work on the suggestions.

- Executive will reconnect later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, white marble temple, refresh, search, sold out
